title: State of health prediction of lithium-ion batteries based on machine learning: Advances and perspectives

tldr.text: The conception of SOH is defined, and the state-of-the-art prediction methods are classified based on their primary implementation procedure, and an exhausted comparison is conducted to elaborate the development of ML-based SOH prediction techniques.
